name: jules
title: Google Jules
description: Interact with Google Jules coding agent directly from Raycast.
author: ntfelix

commands.name: start-new-session
commands.title: Start Session
commands.subtitle: Google Jules
commands.description: Start a new coding session with Google Jules

commands.name: list-sessions
commands.title: Search Sessions
commands.subtitle: Google Jules
commands.description: Search and manage your Google Jules sessions

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
